001package io.cyborgcode.roa.api.annotations;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.hooks.HookExecution;
004import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;
005import java.lang.annotation.Repeatable;
006import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
007import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
008import java.lang.annotation.Target;
009
010/**
011 * Defines a hook to be executed before or after all tests in a test class.
012 *
013 * <p>Each {@code @ApiHook} specifies a hook type (looked up via
014 * {@link io.cyborgcode.utilities.reflections.ReflectionUtil#findEnumImplementationsOfInterface}),
015 * the timing of execution, optional arguments to pass to the hook, and an execution order.
016 * Hooks of the same timing are sorted by {@linkplain #order()} before invocation.
017 *
018 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
019 */
020@Repeatable(ApiHooks.class)
021@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
022@Target(ElementType.TYPE)
023public @interface ApiHook {
024
025   /**
026    * The identifier of the hook flow implementation to invoke.
027    *
028    * <p>This will be passed as the {@code type} argument to
029    * {@link io.cyborgcode.utilities.reflections.ReflectionUtil#findEnumImplementationsOfInterface}.
030    *
031    * @return the hook flow type name
032    */
033   String type();
034
035   /**
036    * When to execute the hook relative to the test lifecycle.
037    *
038    * @return {
039    *     @link HookExecution#BEFORE} to run before all tests,
040    *     {@link HookExecution#AFTER} to run after all tests
041    */
042   HookExecution when();
043
044   /**
045    * Optional arguments to pass into the hook flow.
046    *
047    * @return an array of {@code String} arguments
048    */
049   String[] arguments() default {};
050
051   /**
052    * Execution order of this hook among others with the same {@linkplain #when timing}.
053    *
054    * <p>Hooks with lower order values run earlier.
055    *
056    * @return an integer defining the sort order
057    */
058   int order() default 0;
059
060}
